[[File:DataValuesOld.png|thumb|right|The list of Blocks and Items in [[Java Edition Classic]] and [[Indev]].]]These values apply to blocks placed in the world in Minecraft Classic. Since versions since Minecraft Classic have drastically increased the number of blocks, and removed or re-used IDs, Minecraft Classic has its own list. IDs in {{Color|#00BFFF|light blue}} cannot be legitimately obtained in the player's inventory in the game; they can only be obtained by inventory editors.
